string-array.name: chapterOne
string-array.item:
You are investigating the Oscar Files...


 Tap to continue.
You are located in Oscar Pistorius\' apartment.\n This investigation is filed under: Pistorius Forensic evidences.
Your colleague is with you, waiting for instructions\n He has got a registration recorded from an officer who arrested Pistorius earlier on.\n He also got a hold of a lady who heard what happened...

What do you want to do? 


 Tap to speak.
